snippet.title: COP CAREER TIER 1 | Need For Speed Hot Pursuit Mobile Walkthrough #1
snippet.description:
Need For Speed Most Wanted 2012 Mobile went crazy and I'm more unmotivated and tired of everything than I normally am, so here we are. Need For Speed Hot Pursuit Mobile.

The first thing you'll notice? You can't get the game anymore. At least, it's delisted. But installed it. How? I've had the game before so a quick trawl through purchase history (eventually) lets me download it, though it's named zzSUNSET before the real game title. Lots of delisted apps show that too. For what reason, I don't truly know.

Now, one thing to note is that everything is out of proportion. I can't select any events on the far left of the screen and selecting a car after I unlock it takes multiple tries. Watch the video and you'll see what I mean. 

The handling was idiotic, as were the physics when I first played this game. This video is me getting used to the game, essentially... And needing a Porsche Cayman S to finish an event. Because adjusting.

In spite of old habits I tried to keep it clean and not slide about like a loon in a Vauxhall Astra. At least until I'm really far ahead.

Soon I'll be uploading the first tier of the Racer Career, or maybe the Cop Career sooner. I don't know. For now, enjoy the nostalgia trip back to 2011. (The official console release was 2010, but Google Play says 2011. Hey-ho, I get the game regardless)

Let me know of any feedback, suggestions, criticism, hate or love in the comments. I'll take most of it on board (and probably use a '''racing driver''' excuse or something)
